feat.name: Armor Specialist
entries: You have studied the use of armor, and have improved your ability to use armor effectively.

items.name: Armored Agility
entries: When you wear medium armor you are proficient in, you can add 3, rather than 2, to your AC if you have a Dexterity of 16 or higher.

items.name: Armor Mastery
entries: While you are wielding a shield, wearing medium heavy or heavy armor you are proficient in, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage that you take from nonmagical weapons is reduced by your proficiency bonus. If you are wielding a magical shield, wearing magical medium armor or magical heavy armor (of any type) damage reduction applies to all bludgeoning, piercing or slashing weapons.

items.name: Armored Stealth
entries: Wearing medium or heavy armor which you are proficient in doesn't impose disadvantage on your Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

items.name: Heavy Armor Mobility
entries: You may ignore the minimum Strength requirement of heavy armor you are proficient in.

items.name: Heavy Armor Proficiency
entries: You gain proficiency in heavy armor (you must be proficient in medium armor from a source other than this feat to choose this feature).

items.name: Light Armor Defense
entries: While wearing light armor, you may add your armor's AC bonus to your Dexterity saving throws.

items.name: Light Armor Mastery
entries: While wearing light armor which you are proficient in, and you are damaged by a melee attack, you can use your reaction to move 5 feet in any direction without provoking an opportunity attack.

items.name: Light Armor Mobility
entries: While wearing light armor, opportunity attacks are made against you with disadvantage.

items.name: Light Armor Proficiency
entries: You gain proficiency in light armor.

items.name: Light Armor Versatility
entries: You may wear a {@item chain shirt|phb} or {@item hide armor|phb} as light armor for the sake of determining proficiency. When wearing a {@item chain shirt|phb} or {@item hide armor|phb}, you can add 3, rather than 2, to your AC if you have a Dexterity of 16 or higher.

items.name: Medium Armor Proficiency
entries: You gain proficiency in medium armor (you must be proficient in light armor through a source other than this feat to choose this feature).

items.name: Shield Proficiency
entries: You gain proficiency in shields.

feat.name: Battle Magic

prerequisite.other: the ability to cast at least one spell

entries: Your magic has been honed to use in combat, your quick thinking and specialized training provide certain advantages while fighting with spells.

items.name: Battlecaster
entries: When a hostile creature's movement provokes an opportunity attack from you, you can use your reaction to {@action cast a spell} at the creature, rather than making an opportunity attack. The spell must have a casting time of 1 action and must target only that creature.

items.name: Elemental Adept
entries: Choose one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison or thunder. Spells you cast ignore resistance to damage of the chosen type. You may select this feature more than once with your three selections, if you do so you choose a different damage type. Alternatively, if you select this feature a second time, creatures with immunity to the damage type selected with a previous selection of this feature may be damaged as if they had resistance instead.

items.name: Hardy Concentration
entries: You have advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell when you take damage.

items.name: Mystical Sharpshooter
entries: Up to once on your turn, before you make a ranged spell attack, you can choose to forgo your proficiency modifier to the attack roll. If the attack hits, you add twice your proficiency modifier to the damage.

items.name: Reliable Spells
entries: When you roll damage for a spell you cast, you can treat any 1 on a damage die as a 2.

items.name: Spell Accuracy
entries: Your ranged spell attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover.

items.name: Spell Sniper
entries: When you cast a spell that requires you to make an attack roll, the spell's range is doubled.

items.name: Warcaster
entries: You can perform the somatic components of spells even when you have weapons or a shield in one or both hands.
